articles.title: New coronavirus strain designated a variant of interest by WHO - The Irish Times
articles.description: Mu first identified in Colombia in January with cases also recorded in Europe
articles.content:
A new coronavirus strain, named Mu, has been designated a variant of interest by the World Health Organisation (WHO).
Mu, or B.1.621, was first identified in Colombia and cases have been recorded in… [+1097 chars]

articles.author: Chris Pleasance
articles.title: Afghan refugee reveals horror journey facing those the west left behind - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rohullah Yakobi, who fled Afghanistan in 1999 after the Taliban tortured him aged 12, suffered through a five-year ordeal making his way to Europe - which is now the reality facing those the west left behind.
articles.content:
A former refugee who fled Taliban rule in the 1990s has shed light on the horror journey now facing thousands of Afghans who were abandoned during the west's chaotic evacuation of the country.
